title: Quarantined cruise ship finally ready to sail again, leaves a heartwarming message of thanks

author: Alexandra Deabler
title: Diamond Princess ship 'lifting its quarantine' after disinfection process following COVID-19 outbreak
description: The Diamond Princess ship will be able to set sail again — when cruise travel resumes, that is — roughly two months after experiencing a COVID-19 outbreak onboard, Princess Cruises announced.
